title: Mahindra and Skoda likely to sign pact for proposed JV soon
description: Top executives from Mahindra & Mahindra and Skoda Auto Volkswagen India are set to meet in Mumbai to discuss a potential joint venture. The collaboration aims to share costs, technology, and vehicle platforms for future product development. Talks are progressing well, with a Memorandum of Understanding expected by late October or early November.
